description.title: Welcome to Games United.
description.description: Games United is an independent Digital Entertainment Content Factory with a distinct focus on mobile gaming. Founded in 2021 by experienced entrepreneurs, Games United has achieved to receive investments from Investors in January 2023. We create fun & engaging casual mobile games bu seamlessly integrating art, coding, psychology, intellectual property and storytelling. Our motto is 'Game is Beyond Gaming!'

discover.title: Discover New Areas and Complete Story!
discover.description: Merge new assets and travel undiscovered lands...
discover.sub-description: Discover new places, merge different items and meet amazing new objects. Merge to create and play with new rides in every area.

characters.title: Meet New Friends...
characters.description:
Encounter lively and unforgettable characters as you progress through the map. Each new friend you meet not only adds a unique and vibrant dimension to your adventure but also becomes a friend, guiding you to unexplored paths and helping you unlock new areas.

Together, embark on journeys that will become lifelong memories...

design.title: Design Your Park!
design.description: Merge and transform objects to reveal new wonders. On Customization Design Island, add your unique touch, crafting a park that mirrors your style. Experience the joy of personalization and discovery within a world brimming with creative possibilities.
